title: Church Weekend Away
deck: Time away together as a church family at The Hayes Conference Centre, Swanwick
article:
Join us for a weekend away together as a church family at The Hayes Conference Centre, Swanwick, Derbyshire.

Friday 12th to Sunday 14th April 2019

Adults £125

5-18 yrs £45

0-4 yrs £10

Booking forms now available from the Gateway Office or Sunday Info Point
